entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -8.6°C

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
